file_content.text: We took out the military installation, but there's an inner palace that's sealed tight. How are we stocked to cut through?
Our forces are lessened. But our union remains.
We will corrupt all that is. You will be first--you will quake, writhing on the ground like a bloodied newborn.
You will remember every childhood knot of anxiety. What if you're lost in a dark place? What if a stranger finds you?
You will feel failure and humiliation. You will see your lovers burn, betray you, and laugh because you are unworthy.
That's your invite. Make them regret it.
Lost the comm for a while, but I think we caught the highlights.
